name: outmaneuver
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cleverly get an advantage over someone, especially a competitor: In the negotiations, he outmaneuvered his rivals by offering a higher price. Synonym
outsmart

Add to word list
to obtain an advantage over someone, esp. a competitor, in a skillful or intelligent way: He outmaneuvered the competition.
